meanings.sent1: The new house was roomier than the old one.
meanings.sent2: The larger suitcase was roomier and could fit all my clothes.
meanings.sent3: The roomier car made the long road trip much more comfortable.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed in the roomier hall, filling it with joy.
meanings.sent5: The roomier classroom allowed for better movement during activities.

meanings.sent1: The roomier tent was perfect for our camping trip.
meanings.sent2: The roomier desk allowed for better organization of papers.
meanings.sent3: The roomier picnic basket held all the delicious treats for the outing.
meanings.sent4: The roomier closet seemed to magically accommodate more clothes.
meanings.sent5: The roomier kitchen made cooking together a delightful experience.
